dotnetType.name: NullDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary: A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.NullSchema" />.

returns.summary: A function that accepts a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and returns a null value.

overloads.summary: Builds a null deserializer for a type-schema pair.

returns.summary: Whether the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.NullSchema" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a schema.

returns.summary: Always true; the null deserializer returns the default value for the type.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a type resolution.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NullDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
